keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Pirates Massively Expand with Level 6 Criminals
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard successfully recruits four dangerous Level 6 prisoners (Catarina Devon, Vasco Shot, San Juan Wolf, and Avalo Pizarro) through a brutal death match selection process, massively increasing the crew's power.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Blackbeard Pirates as one of the most dangerous crews in the world, with multiple world-class criminals joining. Sets up future confrontations between Blackbeard and other major powers.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with three skulls arranged horizontally, with crossed bones behind

keyMoments.title: Kid Pirates Embrace the New Era
keyMoments.description: Eustass Kid declares to his crew that the war's end is the beginning of a New Age, positioning the Kid Pirates as major players in the post-Marineford world.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Kid Pirates' ambition to be leaders in the new era of piracy and establishes their rivalry with other Supernovas.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing goggles with crossed guns behind it
